title: Slow Cooker Spinach and Artichoke ChickenInstant Pot Spinach and Artichoke Chicken
directions: Place all ingredients in the crockpot except 2 oz. of the shredded cheese.
Add remaining cheese on top and put lid back on for another 5 minutes, until the cheese melts.
Place all ingredients in the Instant Pot except 2 oz. of the shredded cheese.
Let the Instant Pot naturally depressurize for at least 5 minutes.
Release the rest of the pressure, open and stir.
Add remaining cheese on top and put lid back on for another 5 minutes (not a cook cycle), until the cheese melts.
ingredients: 1 - 1.5 lbs. boneless skinless chicken breast, cut into chunks
5 oz. spinach (1/2 package thawed spinach package - liquid removed)
1/2 jar of artichoke hearts, rinsed and chopped
1 - 1.5 lbs. boneless skinless chicken breast, cut into chunks
5 oz. spinach (1/2 package thawed spinach package - liquid removed)
1/2 jar of artichoke hearts, rinsed and chopped
